actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide for permanent year-round daylight savings time.

summary.text: Provides for permanent year-round daylight savings time under the Uniform Time Act. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to submit, within one year, a report to the Congress on the effects of year-round daylight savings time.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide for permanent year-round daylight savings time.
